snippet: Jordan Farmar hit a 3-pointer from the right wing with 0.2 of a second left and the Nets squandered an 18-point, second-half lead before beating the Los Angeles Clippers, 101-100.
abstract: NBA Roundup; New Jersey Nets beat Los Angeles Clippers, 101-100; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jordan Farmar hit a 3-pointer from the right wing with 0.2 of a second left and the Nets squandered an 18-point, second-half lead before beating the Los Angeles Clippers, 101-100.

headline.seo: Nets Edge Clippers on Farmar’s Last-Second 3-Pointer
headline.main: Nets Edge Clippers on Farmar’s Last-Second 3-Pointer
headline.print_headline: Nets Edge Clippers on Farmar’s Last-Second 3-Pointer
